General.Name: Hong Leong Capital Bhd
General.Description: Hong Leong Capital Berhad, an investment holding company, provides financial services in Malaysia. It operates through Investment Banking and Stockbroking, Fund Management and Unit Trust Management, and Investment Holding and Others segments. The company's investment banking services include arranging and structuring debt and equity fund raising comprising initial public offerings, right issues, restricted issues, special issues, and private placements, as well as corporate bonds and sukuk issuance, and syndicated loans; debt and equity underwriting; deposit taking; mergers and acquisitions advisory; agency services; and treasury related solutions, such as interest rate and foreign exchange hedging, and pricing and distribution of primary bonds. It also provides retail and institutional stockbroking, equity research, margin financing, nominees and custody, and futures and option broking services; and investment solutions in equities, fixed income, money market, and unit trust and wholesale funds for state governments, insurance companies, endowments, family offices, charitable organizations, corporations, and retail and high net worth individuals. In addition, the company offers trading and distribution services; investment management; and unit trust and fund management services, as well as sells unit trusts. Hong Leong Capital Berhad was formerly known as HLG Capital Berhad and changed its name to Hong Leong Capital Berhad in November 2010. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Hong Leong Capital Berhad is a subsidiary of Hong Leong Financial Group Berhad.
